terms.name: Dissolve
terms.def: To "disappear" into a liquid through mixing

terms.name: Water
terms.def: A molecule that consists of 2 Hydrogen and 1 Oxygen atom

terms.name: Solution
terms.def: A mixture of two or more substances that stays evenly mixed

terms.name: Solid
terms.def: A state of matter that keeps its own shape instead of changing to the shape of its container

terms.name: Mixture
terms.def: A combination of two or more substances that can be separated by physical means

terms.name: Physical Properties
terms.def: Characteristics that can be observed or measured without changing the composition of a substance

terms.name: Light
terms.def: A form of energy that travels in straight lines

terms.name: Heat/Thermal Energy
terms.def: A form of energy that transfers from a warmer object to a colder object

terms.name: Energy (Movement)
terms.def: Energy can be used to move objects

terms.name: Energy (Change)
terms.def: Energy can create changes in objects

terms.name: More Force = More Motion
terms.def: The greater the force, the greater the change in motion

terms.name: Opposing Forces
terms.def: Forces that are in opposite directions of eachother
